name: Quarto Login Demo
postCreateCommand: chmod +x /workspaces/Coding-Lessons/.devcontainer/check_versions.sh && /opt/conda/bin/conda init bash && conda env create -f /workspaces/Coding-Lessons/.devcontainer/environment.yml || conda env update -f /workspaces/Coding-Lessons/.devcontainer/environment.yml && echo 'if [ -z "$CHECKED_VERSIONS" ]; then conda activate quarto-env && cd /workspaces/Coding-Lessons && ./.devcontainer/check_versions.sh; export CHECKED_VERSIONS=1; fi' >> ~/.bashrc
